title: Tech Mahindra Launches Metaverse-based Solution To Gamify Learning | Mint - Mint
content: Tech Mahindra Launches Metaverse-based Solution To Gamify Learning | Mint  Mint
description: The Meta Village will enable the students to play on Roblox to learn the basics of computers and coding in Bharat MarkUp Language (BHAML), a platform built by Makers Lab that enables anyone to code in their native language.
